tweets.html:
My daughter just named all the members of The Avengers by herself and SHUT UP I'M NOT CRYING JUST SHUT UP!!!

— Tim (@Playing_Dad) August 22, 2013

just finished reading episode #505 of The Good Wife. Wow. This is the "Red Wedding" episode of our show.

— Graham Phillips (@GrahamPhillips) August 22, 2013

Looking forward to Breaking Bad Babies, an adorable ensemble show featuring all the endangered offspring of the main characters.

— Emily Nussbaum (@emilynussbaum) August 22, 2013

I'm like a Mormon missionary, but for trying to get people to watch LOUIE.

— A.S. Paul (@aspaul) August 22, 2013

I'm at my bedroom watching YouTube kitties without pants on w/ no others ever. #AccurateFourSquareLocations

— Brent Piaskoski (@BrentPiaskoski) August 22, 2013

Watching the #Dads pilot again because the things I do for you people.

— Alyssa Rosenberg (@AlyssaRosenberg) August 22, 2013

@AlyssaRosenberg None of us asked you to do that! YOU CAN'T MAKE US FEEL GUILTY! ...Okay, fine, I feel guilty!

— Noel Kirkpatrick (@noelrk) August 22, 2013

How FOX can fix Dads: cancel it, go on a Stalinist information purge, stop at nothing, not even murder, to make us forget it ever existed

— David Sims (@davidlsims) August 22, 2013

Lauren Graham writing a pilot for the CW is truly all I've ever wanted.

— Kayla Kumari Upadhyaya (@KaylaKumari) August 22, 2013

If I ever go on the People's Court I'm bringing so many goddamn manila folders it'll blow your fucking mind.

— aaron blitzstein (@BlitznBeans) August 22, 2013

Tina Fey had her computer stolen with all of her ideas on it. That's why I never have ideas.

— K.P. Anderson (@ikpanderson) August 22, 2013

What's your favorite thing at Bubba Gump Shrimp Co., the Vietnam Crab Cakes or the Jenny Dies Of AIDS Shrimp Skewers?

— Chase Mitchell (@ChaseMit) August 22, 2013

@JeffProbst Rupert Again? isn't his 15 minutes up already? Evidently he got a groupon for another go.

— Jeff Probst (@JeffProbst) August 22, 2013

The NFL is basically Breaking Bad now: Pushing its viewers to ask, "Why are we still rooting for these guys?"http://t.co/QCqoyRMAEA

— Michael D. Dwyer (@michaelddwyer) August 22, 2013

"Get Over It" would be a great name for a sitcom I would never watch.

— Brent Piaskoski (@BrentPiaskoski) August 22, 2013

Every time I'm like, "Fuck yeah, The Newsroom!" it somehow finds a way to make me all, "Fuck you, The Newsroom!"

— Todd VanDerWerff (@tvoti) August 23, 2013

Can David Tennant and Olivia Colman just be on every show?

— Caroline Siede (@CarolineSiede) August 23, 2013

Until Breaking Bad is over I plan on yelling "Dammit Marie", every time I see a commercial for The Michael J. Fox Show

— brian (@AdmiraltyPirate) August 23, 2013

So how much longer it Netflix gonna make us wait for more #OITNB? One week? Two? Hurry up already, what kind of on-demand service are you?

— Devan Joneson (@djoneson) August 23, 2013

Britishest: “Star of BBC's The Apprentice defends decision to ditch apostrophe from name of her baking business.” http://t.co/zS2bhNjDEw

— pourmecoffee (@pourmecoffee) August 23, 2013

Would I trade all the future seasons of almost every other show I currently watch for one more season of #Enlightened? Yes. In a heartbeat.

— Greg Boyd (@Greg447) August 23, 2013

Everything I know about Denmark, I learned from Borgen and Hamlet.

— Todd VanDerWerff (@tvoti) August 23, 2013

My safe word is "Catfish: The TV Show"

— Julie Klausner (@julieklausner) August 23, 2013

I want to live in North Korea where there is no topical humor

— Sam (@SamuelMoen) August 23, 2013

NO THANKS I'M GOOD RT @THR: Ben Stiller Reviving 'Reality Bites' as NBC Comedy http://t.co/6AE9ezjazK

— pilot (@pilotbacon) August 22, 2013

I have so many feelings about a Reality Bites TV show, and 90 percent of them are about the possible soundtrack.

— Margaret Lyons (@margeincharge) August 23, 2013

#BLOODVERSUSWATER #TWISTS #DUELSWITHTHREEPEOPLE #RELATIVES #BONEHAM #REILLY #HANTZ #WHY #NOTHANKYOU #UGH #SAD #CBS #BB15 #BB15 #BB15

— Max Dawson (@fymaxwell) August 23, 2013

Sometimes I think about what it would be like to be Helen’s husband and I get scared and sad and angry and I just want to be alone. #bb15

— Max Dawson (@fymaxwell) August 23, 2013

Thank god they evicted Helen. It’s been weeks since #bb15 gave us anything that could be construed as racism. I was starting to get worried.

— Max Dawson (@fymaxwell) August 23, 2013

Elissa’s goodbye message to Helen: “Nnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnn.” #bb15

— Max Dawson (@fymaxwell) August 23, 2013

If I do will u stop flashing tweets on screen? RT @SyfyMovies: RETWEET if you live in a small, coastal town - haunted by sharks! #GhostShark

— brian (@AdmiraltyPirate) August 23, 2013

Nothing like a series of grisly deaths to finally get your kids to go to the local museum #GhostShark

— Kel "Jingle Jangle Bells" K. (@TVKel) August 23, 2013

Well we made it through over 50% of the movie before #GhostShark got the black guy, so there's that

— brian (@AdmiraltyPirate) August 23, 2013

This shark eats kids y'all. I knew this movie would be edgy because it started with a dubstep song. #GhostShark

— Kel "Jingle Jangle Bells" K. (@TVKel) August 23, 2013

Bull from Night Court has a remarkable grasp on Latin for a drunken Lighthouse keeper #GhostShark

— brian (@AdmiraltyPirate) August 23, 2013

Dear Lord, we give thanks for you making Jenji Kohan skip Nancy's prison stint in Weeds so she could save her prison ideas for #OITNB, Amen.

— Devan Joneson (@djoneson) August 23, 2013

I'm paralyzed with jokes RT @katherinemiller: RT @THR: Ben Affleck is 'Batman' for 'Man of Steel' Sequel http://t.co/USRe1mgNwQ

— meaning machine (@EricThurm) August 23, 2013

tweets.author_name: Amy celebrates Wrinkle in Time instead of XMas
tweets.html:
you GUYS, Ben Affleck is both Daredevil and Batman. HE'S A ONE-STOP MASKED-VIGILANTE-DOUCHEBAG SHOP.

— Amy celebrates Wrinkle in Time instead of XMas (@spooloflies) August 23, 2013

Holy shit... BEN AFFLECK IS THE NEW BATMAN!!! http://t.co/acivqxFl0U Do you know what this means? It means that I've seen Batman naked!!!

— KevinSmith (@ThatKevinSmith) August 23, 2013

I think choosing Casey Affleck to play Batman is a bold and unexpected choice.

— Marvel's Infinity Waco (@johnwarrender) August 23, 2013

I would totally buy Ben Affleck as Adam West.

— Mark Harris (@MarkHarrisNYC) August 23, 2013

"Argo Fuck Yourself", he whispers to the Joker right before delivering him to the Gotham Police.

— Tyler Dinucci (@TylerDinucci) August 23, 2013

You read for a part, you feel good about it, you feel confident, then they cast Ben Affleck.

— Richard Dreyfuss (@RichardDreyfuss) August 23, 2013

ben affleck has a very good chin for batman and that's all i care about

— pilot (@pilotbacon) August 23, 2013

Batman fuck yourself.

— Rafael Ordaya Vera (@rafaelordaya) August 23, 2013

Well, it could have been Ryan Reynolds.

— Michael Brown (@ImMichaelBrown) August 23, 2013

Somewhere out there Christian Bale is giggling.

— devon sawa (@DevonESawa) August 23, 2013

gone girl? more like gone batgirl. because ben affleck's in the gone girl adaptation, see. hey, i'm trying my fucking best here. you try and

— Scaremy Jingleghost (@JeremyMonjo) August 23, 2013

I was looking forward to hearing Ben Affleck's Batman voice until I realized Terrence Malick would be directing. :(

— Will Goss (@williambgoss) August 23, 2013

Predicting at least 3 rage-fueled internet petitions: Replace Affleck w/ Nathan Fillion, Donald Glover, or a woman (probably Helen Mirren).

— Bryan Murphy (@Bryan_Murphy) August 23, 2013

How come I'm the only one who put together that we can call him Bat Affleck now guys, it seems so obvious

— brian (@AdmiraltyPirate) August 23, 2013

this movie isn't out for two years. that's a lot of tweets

— maura 🎙 johnston (@maura) August 23, 2013

Ben Affleck playing Batman is cool. But Ben Affleck replacing Zack Snyder would be better.

— Mark (@tole_cover) August 23, 2013

wow... they cast a competent actor with a square jaw, big muscles and tons of charisma as batman... it's a world gone mad!

— javi grillo-marxuach (@OKBJGM) August 23, 2013

But really though, at least it's not Channing Tatum

— sugarpuff jc 🌸 (@Patronhippie) August 23, 2013

A travel advisory has been issued for all comic and movie fan sites. Please refrain from non-essential visits until further notice. #Bengate

— Merry Whitta 🎄 (@garywhitta) August 23, 2013

.@DrPhil If a girl is drunk, is it OK for Ben Affleck to play Batman?

— rob delaney (@robdelaney) August 23, 2013

Ben Affleck should be allowed thirty minutes alone with Whitey Bulger in his Batman suit to do whatever he wants for Boston.

— pourmecoffee (@pourmecoffee) August 23, 2013

Why I love Twitter: my stream goes from smart higher ed commentary & Egyptian analysis to universal outrage over Affleck.

— Susanna Williams (@SusannaDW) August 23, 2013

Where were you when you heard Ben Affleck was Batman? Share your stories.

— Paul Southworth (@southworth) August 23, 2013

i for one think peter capaldi will be an excellent batman.

— javi grillo-marxuach (@OKBJGM) August 23, 2013

WOW, @BenAffleck is gonna play Batman. I hope he fights the Joke-ah! #wickedpissah

— Patton Oswalt (@pattonoswalt) August 23, 2013

"Why so serious?"
"I'm only capable of conveying one emotion because I'm played by Ben Affleck."
I nailed it everyone! Top-notch joke!

— Zach 🚷 (@zhaldeman) August 23, 2013

Nobody in this food court is talking about ben affleck what's wrong with them

— Sophie 🌹 (@insopherable) August 23, 2013

i was gonna complain about everyone making bahston accent jokes, and then i realized that bahston accent jokes are all pretty awesome, so.

— Scaremy Jingleghost (@JeremyMonjo) August 23, 2013

I'm now totally confident I'll eventually play Iron Man.

— Stephen Amell (@StephenAmell) August 23, 2013

I guess the exciting thing about Ben Affleck playing Batman is... [falls asleep midsentence]

— Louis Peitzman (@LouisPeitzman) August 23, 2013

1: Think of a Ben Affleck/Batman joke. 2: Check TL to see if it's been done. 3: It has. 3Xs already. Step 4: Drink when you see "Clooney"

— 🎄manda B🎁wer (@heyprofbow) August 23, 2013

Ben Affleck's gawnah put all of Gawtham in his reyah vyoo. #demapples #boston #raydonovan

— Matt Fowler (@TheMattFowler) August 23, 2013

My Twitter feed seems to be suggesting that Ben Affleck is... How do I put this? From Boston.

— Daniel Fienberg (@TheFienPrint) August 23, 2013

"You like apples, Riddl-ah?" You can totally use that one, @BenAffleck.

— Patton Oswalt (@pattonoswalt) August 23, 2013

"I'm not weah-ring hockey pants! Oh wait, I am. I so hammah-ed." You might have to pay me for that one, @BenAffleck

— Patton Oswalt (@pattonoswalt) August 23, 2013

I just deleted a Gigli joke. Thank me later.

— Tressie Mc (@tressiemcphd) August 23, 2013

Any expressions of enthusiasm for Ben Affleck being cast as Batman will not be tolerated. #overlyhonestsyllabi

— Adam B. Golub (@adamgolub) August 23, 2013

The Affleck/ Batman twitter satire account has over 12k followers already & like 3 non-clever tweets. "Catfish" has new pool to cast from.

— 🎄manda B🎁wer (@heyprofbow) August 23, 2013

How about if nine actors and actresses play Batman and Todd Haynes directs: I'M NOT BATMAN.

— MZS (@mattzollerseitz) August 23, 2013

Marvel reacts to the Affleck news: http://t.co/EynO1sqsef

— Hayes Brown (@HayesBrown) August 23, 2013

ATTENTION: The "Ben Affleck As Batman" story was just a test of your emergency Twitter system. You all passed.

— Tim Long (@mrtimlong) August 23, 2013

Holy shit, guys. I can't believe Ben Affleck won an Academy Award for Best Screenplay.

— Rob Sheridan (@robertdsheridan) August 23, 2013

Favorite thing about Twitter: Thing happens, people make jokes, all jokes about it declared stale and hacky. Total elapsed time: 10 minutes.

— Brian Grubb (@briancgrubb) August 23, 2013

Idris Elba can't play Batman. Millions of men would realize they were gay, and women's ovaries would detonate.

— MZS (@mattzollerseitz) August 23, 2013

That talking candlestick from Beauty and the Beast as Commissioner Gordon.

— Scott Chernoff (@ScottChernoff) August 23, 2013

Ben Affleck is the new Batman. He must not know how that derailed George Clooney's career.

— Crutnacker (@Crutnacker) August 23, 2013

I agree he should have gotten an Oscar nom for directing Argo, but this is taking the sympathy a bit too far.

— (((Andrew Rabin)))📎 (@arrabin56) August 23, 2013

Do I feel good about my Batman/Boston tweet? No. Was it worth it? No. Original? No no. But I will do it again because it felt good.

— kevinbiegel (@kbiegel) August 23, 2013

Idris Elba as Batman, directed by Edgar Wright. Voila.

— MZS (@mattzollerseitz) August 23, 2013

Don't act like the Batman voice with a Boston accent isn't going to be incredible.

— Dan Clyne (@danCLYNE) August 23, 2013

Jennifer Garner sips her wine, smiles sweetly, asks her friend, "So what's your husband up to?"

— Richard Lawson (@rilaws) August 23, 2013

I now want to see Ben Affleck lay a beating on Val Kilmer. Admittedly the logic isn't entirely linear. But I feel this strongly. #Batman

— Scott Reid (@_scottreid) August 23, 2013

I don't care about Batman, I'm just not in favor of Ben Affleck getting acting jobs. But if it keeps him out of another Malick, I'm psyched.

— Zach 🚷 (@zhaldeman) August 23, 2013

In a way, Ben Affleck as Batman is the Iranians fault #Batfleck

— Sam Stryker (@sbstryker) August 23, 2013

West - Who?
Keaton - Mr. Mom, seriously?
Kilmer - RU high?
Clooney - Ugh, a tv star.
Bale - WTF, a Brit?

If twitter existed then.

— Kelly Senecal (@kelcynical) August 23, 2013

Alison Brie. Michelle McLaren. WONDER WOMAN. Kick the invisible tires and light the invisible fires.

— Jesse Crap (@jessecarp) August 23, 2013

Alison Brie would be a Wonder Woman men want. I want a Wonder Woman women deserve.

— Libby Hill (@midwestspitfire) August 23, 2013

Idris Elba for Wonder Woman.

— Declan de Barra (@declandebarra) August 23, 2013

Furious that Matt Damon was the one who said "How do you like THEM apples?!" because I had a C+ Batman joke and Twitter has ruined my life.

— Caroline Framke (@carolineframke) August 23, 2013

Played 'Guess who the new Batman is?' with @thewendybain. 'He's better known as a director these days. Bearded.' 'Mike Leigh?'

— Sam Bain (@sambaintv) August 23, 2013

I wanted Michael Fassbender to get the part so wardrobe would have to make the codpiece bigger. #BenAffleckAsBatman

— Bobby Rivers (@BobbyRiversTV) August 23, 2013

Next you’ll be telling me that Bradley Cooper is voicing a CGI raccoon in space.

— Dan Moren (@dmoren) August 23, 2013

I really hope David O. Russell's next movie is just Bradley Cooper reading Deadline and frowning

— Richard Lawson (@rilaws) August 23, 2013

"Hahahahahahahaha" - any Hollywood meeting where adding a black superhero is suggested by the new junior exec

— Jon Lovett (@jonlovett) August 23, 2013

Imagine being the person who has to punch Ben Affleck in the throat to help him get the Batman voice right. Just imagine.

— Stuart Heritage (@stuheritage) August 23, 2013

Spend ten years working your way back into everyone's good graces. Win an Oscar. Then you get cast as Batman, and BAM! You're Gigli again.

— Tim Carvell (@timcarvell) August 23, 2013

Ben Affleck ruins everything. I thought tonight would be all about #GhostShark in my feed.

— Kel "Jingle Jangle Bells" K. (@TVKel) August 23, 2013

HOLLYWOOD TRIVIA: Louis CK and Benaffle CK are brothers

— Eli Braden (@EliBraden) August 23, 2013

"You know what? Fine! It's not Ben Affleck anymore! Batman will be played by Glenn Close, in character as Albert Nobbs! Happy now?"

— Tim Carvell (@timcarvell) August 23, 2013

Casey Affleck has been cast as Fart Cop. Looks like French Stewart will play Downstairs Neighbor Terry. Cautiously optimistic. #FartCop

— John Moe (@johnmoe) August 23, 2013

"Aw, you're making me blush!" - how I'll react tomorrow when accosted by people complimenting my Affleck/Batman tweets

— Todd Barry (@toddbarry) August 23, 2013

Guys, here's the thing: He totally *is* the Batman you deserve.

— Lindsay S. Pumpkin Pie (@thelindsayellis) August 23, 2013

Ben affleck is toooooooo boss

— Patrick Shriver (@PSchwarzenegger) August 23, 2013

I agree with Patrick Schwarzenegger. Affleck is perhaps a little too boss.

— Richard Lawson (@rilaws) August 23, 2013

I don't care who plays Batman as long as we are told his origin story again!!!

— Chris Regan (@ChrisRRegan) August 23, 2013

Funniest thing about Ben Affleck playing Batman is... OK, second funniest thing is when the UK wakes up and realises it's not a joke.

— Lorna Cooper (@Coops_tv) August 23, 2013

At least the Internet can agree that, as always, it should've been Idris Elba.

— Daniel Kibblesmith ⛄️⚔️☃️ (@kibblesmith) August 23, 2013

Don't get upset before you see the movie. Maybe Superman kills Batman in the first five minutes and the casting doesn't matter.

— Steven Rosenthal (@Rosenthaltweets) August 23, 2013

13,492 people have now suggested Matt Damon play Robin. Well done.

— Kelly Marie Carlin (@kelly_carlin) August 23, 2013

With Ben Affleck as Batman, you know who Matt Damon should play? Vicki Vale. Let's sexually confuse some motherfuckers.

— Todd VanDerWerff (@tvoti) August 23, 2013

Should have got Jason Bateman for Bateman.

— Tim Heidecker (leaving 1/1/18) (@timheidecker) August 23, 2013

Glad to get on Twitter tonight at the "Stop complaining about Affleck as Batman" phase, not the "Let's complain!" phase.

— Josh Spiegel (@mousterpiece) August 23, 2013

Ben Affleck awakes, checks Twitter. "Affleck is Batman? Sucks!" He chuckles, kisses his movie star wife, pats his Oscar, goes back to bed.

— Chris Hewitt (@ChrisHewitt) August 23, 2013

Hey gang, sorry I'm late. How have all of your Batman/Argo jokes been faring?

— Michael Schneider (@franklinavenue) August 23, 2013

I bet the Dr. Who people are psyched they didn’t go with Ben Affleck.

— 🌎Joshua Malina🌎 (@JoshMalina) August 23, 2013

All Affleck has to do is put a mask on and hit things. Even I can do that. As it's a Snyder film he can take his time and do it really slow.

— Frankie says "Arm The Unemployed" (@retroremakes) August 23, 2013

tweets.author_name: cybernetic sarCC of xmas past from the future
tweets.html:
friend suggested Timothy Olyphant would make a good Batman dammit I'm never going to sleep tonight am i

— cybernetic sarCC of xmas past from the future (@sarCCastro) August 23, 2013

You know who's very upset about Ben Affleck being cast as Batman? Syrian children killed by chemical weapons.#TalkAboutFirstWorldProblems

— God (@TheTweetOfGod) August 23, 2013
